name: SIGNATURE_DATA_STRINGS
description: Contains the raw signature data collected from a signature device for electronic signatures collected for a document.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SIGNATURE_DATA
columns.description: Contains the raw signature data collected from a signature device.
